definitions.text: the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior
examples: we did not understand his motivation
he acted with the best of motives

definitions.text: a theme that is repeated or elaborated in a piece of music
a design or figure that consists of recurring shapes or colors, as in architecture or decoration
causing or able to cause motion

examples: it may well be that ethical language has primarily a motivative function
